page.title: 20Shopping survey
page.content: Wayfarers Arcade is a typical Victorian structure of Lord Street.It has an ornamental glass roof and is built off the main street.The arcade contains a wide variety of goods. A survey of ten people was carried out,the results being: Eight out of ten people did not come from Southport.Six people were visiting for the first time.Two people visited regularly.Two other people came every two to three months.Two people came to buy,the others to glance.The main liking for the arcade was the relaxed atmosphere and quality of shops.Most of the shopkeepers found Summer/Autumn sales and Christmas the busiest period of the year,weekends being the busiest period of the week. Improvements suggested were more flowers,painting regularly,and balcony repairs.
